title: Speed limit on DNA-making sets pace for life's first steps

title_detail.value: Speed limit on DNA-making sets pace for life's first steps

summary: Fruit flies make for stingy mothers, imparting only a portion of the genetic building blocks their offspring need to survive. The rest must be produced by the fertilized egg in its first few steps of growth.

summary_detail.value: Fruit flies make for stingy mothers, imparting only a portion of the genetic building blocks their offspring need to survive. The rest must be produced by the fertilized egg in its first few steps of growth.
